description:
新托福口语第六题预测真题
2012年01月21日 北美托福考试 口语真题
Question 6
Narrator: You will now listen to part of a lecture. You will then be asked a question about it. After you hear the question, you will have 20 seconds to prepare your response and 60 seconds to speak.
Narrator: Now listen to part of a talk from a lecture.
 

Using points and examples from the talk, explain the two ways in which animals use plants to be their own doctors.

Preparation Time: 20 Seconds

Response Time: 60 Seconds

回答详解

Note-taking笔记

Topic

2 ways →ani use plants →protect ×ill

Example 1

mky →×insect, bact~ ←use piper plant →cover body

Example 2

chmpz (chimpanzee) →×poison from body ←eat leaves

+ eat dif fd

Paraphrasing 笔记转述

Topic

l  2 ways →ani use plants →protect ×ill

The lecture is about two ways in which animals use plants to protect themselves from getting an illness.

Example 1

l  mky →×insect, bact~ ←use piper plant →cover body

Monkeys ward off insects, bacteria, and fungal infections by use of the piper plant.

Example 2

l  chmpz (chimpanzee) →×poison from body ←eat leaves

Chimpanzees eat certain leaves to keep poison out of their bodies…

l   + eat dif fd

…which also allows them to enjoy a more varied diet.

Sample Response 参考答案

Topic

The lecture is about two ways in which animals use plants to protect themselves from getting an illness.

Example 1

Monkeys are the example the lecturer uses to highlight animals’ use of medicinal plants. Whitefacedcapuchin monkeys ward offinsects, bacteria,and fungalinfectionsby use of the piper plant.

Example 2

Likewise,chimpanzeeseat certain leaves to keep poison out of their bodies, which also allows them to enjoy a more varied diet. These deliberate uses of an antidoteto poison are beneficial to their health.
实用表达课堂
highlight 使突出；强调  medicinal plant 药用植物  ward off 抵挡  fungal 真菌引起的  chimpanzee 黑猩猩  antidote 解毒剂
 
常远老师提示
by use of
意为“通过使用…”，在这里use 为名词。也可用by doing 表达“以…方式”，故本句也可写为：… by using the piper plant.
varied
varied / a wide variety of / diverse mix of / various 都可表达“各种各样的”，当然还有最“水”的一种：different。
 
听力原文
[Lecture]
Surprising as it may sound, people are not the only species that has doctors! A number of animals use plants to, in effect, be their own doctors. Let’s look at a few examples of this now.
As you might expect, monkeys are among the animal kingdom’s doctors. The white-faced capuchin monkey rubs itself with leaves from the piper plant. This not only repels lice and mosquitoes, but also protects the monkey against various kinds of bacteria and fungus infections!
Likewise, the chimpanzees eat a lot of leaves which are high in cyanide, a deadly poison. Over time, the poison can build up in the body and make the monkey ill, or even die. But the monkeys counteract the effect of this by eating charcoal, and herbal plants. Thus the species can get the illness out of their bodies and comfort themselves. Also, by eating the leaves, they can eat a wider variety of food than they otherwise could.
 
 
《常远新托福口语真经——年度最新预测真题》（含MP3光盘一张）
 作者：常远
 出版社：外语教学与研究出版社
 责任编辑：许圆圆
 版次：2013年5月1版1次印刷
 定价：49.00
 开本：16K
注：本文内容节选于《常远新托福口语真经——年度最新预测真题》一书。本书由外语教学与研究出版社出版，沪江英语授权转载部分内容。

title: 新托福口语第六题预测真题：2012年01月21日 北美托福考试 口语真题

description:
新托福口语第五题预测真题
2012年01月21日 北美托福考试 口语真题
Question 5
Narrator: You will now listen to a conversation. You will then be asked a question about it. After you hear the question, you will have 20 seconds to prepare your response and 60 seconds to speak.
Narrator: Now listen to a conversation between two students.

The speakers discuss two possible solutions to the man’s problem. Describe the problem and the two solutions. Then explain what you think the man should do and why.

Preparation Time: 20 Seconds

Response Time: 60 Seconds

回答详解

Note-taking笔记

Problem

→tutor frd →math test

but tk ←rmt →concert / nite

2 solutions

miss the show →tutor frd & →show, find another tutor

Better choice

1st √

Reasons

1) promised → tutor

rude → another tutor ×warn

2) duty ＞entertain~

if man ×keep cmt (commitment), when ?

Paraphrasing 笔记转述

Problem

l  → tutor frd → math test

The man promised to tutor a friend for a math test.

l  but tk ← rmt → concert / nite

But his roommate got tickets for a one-time-only concert

2 solutions

l  miss the show → tutor frd & → show, find another tutor

He can either miss the performance to tutor his friend, or he can go to the concert and tell his friend to find another tutor.

Better choice

l  1st √

Personally speaking, the first solution is better.

Reasons

l  1) promised → tutor

He made the promise to do the tutoring first.

l  rude → another tutor ×warn

It would be rude to tell his friend to find another tutor without any warning in advance.

l  2) duty ＞entertain~

I think duty takes precedence over entertainment.

l  if man ×keep cmt (commitment), when?

If the man does not learn to keep a commitment now while he is young, when will he learn to do so?

Sample Response 参考答案

Problem

The man is faced with the problem that he promised to tutor a friend for a math test. But then his roommate got tickets for a one-time-onlyconcert given by his favorite musician. He is facing adilemma and doesn’t know what to do.

2 solutions

He can either miss the performance to tutor his friend or he can go to the concert and tell his friend to find another tutor.

Better choice

Personally speaking, the first solution is better.

Reasons

He made the promise to do the tutoring first. Plus, it would be rude to tell his friend to find another tutor without any warning in advance. Also, I think duty takes precedence over entertainment. If the man does not learn to keep a commitmentnow while he is young, when will he learn to do so?

实用表达课堂
one-time-only 仅此一次的 keep a commitment 信守承诺

常远老师提示
take precedence over
意为“比…更重要；优先于…”。在本答案中，这句话意为“履行责任比娱乐活动重要”。又如：Friendship takes precedence over beauty. 不要重色轻友。

听力原文
[Conversation]
W: Hi, Jeff, you seem thoughtful today.
M: Well, I do have a problem. I’m not sure how to solve it.
W: So tell me about it. Two heads are better than one.
M: I promised to tutor Joe in math. We’ve got that test, and…
W: Joe is hopelessly confused, I know. I heard you talking to him.
M: But, my roommate just got tickets to go hear Muddy Watters play jazz. I’ve ALWAYS wanted to hear him! I’ve got all his records and everything. Problem is, the concert is tonight, at the same time I told Joe we’d meet. So… what should I do?
W: If it was me, I’d go see Joe. He is your best friend, and a promise is a promise. Plus, you told him first. Go listen to Muddy Watters tomorrow.
M: I know and I feel so guilty. But Muddy Watters is here for just the one night. If I don’t go now, I’ll not have another chance.
W: Well, there is the Tutoring Center. You could tell Joe to call them and line up another tutor. That way you could go to the concert and Joe could still get the help he needs.
M: True… But Joe likes the way I explain things. Telling him “Get someone else.” like this and on short notice is like saying “I don’t care.” He’s got enough worries with the test coming. He doesn’t need me making things even harder on him.

 

《常远新托福口语真经——年度最新预测真题》（含MP3光盘一张）
 作者：常远
 出版社：外语教学与研究出版社
 责任编辑：许圆圆
 版次：2013年5月1版1次印刷
 定价：49.00
 开本：16K
注：本文内容节选于《常远新托福口语真经——年度最新预测真题》一书。本书由外语教学与研究出版社出版，沪江英语授权转载部分内容。

title: 新托福口语第五题预测真题：2012年01月21日 北美托福考试 口语真题

description:
2013韩国小姐候选人遭吐槽：整容流水线“长得都一样”>>>

After months of preparation there can only be one winner and today a 21-year-old student beat 54 other participants to win Miss Korea.在经过几个月的准备后，2013韩国小姐总决赛的冠军诞生了，一位21岁的大学生击败另外54位参赛者，赢得了韩国小姐的称号。

Winner Yoo Ye-bin, a college student took the crown in Seoul today. She will now go on to represent South Korea for this year's Miss Universe beauty pageant.冠军刘艺彬今天在首尔带上了韩国小姐的皇冠，她还将代表韩国，参与今年的环球小姐选美大赛的角逐。

The 20 finalists already hit the headlines this year when their photos were posted on Reddit fuelling speculation that many of them had undergone surgery and prompting users to criticise the Asian nation's growing trend to go under the knife.2013韩国小姐的决赛20名选手今年登上了新闻头条，红迪网用户上传了她们的照片，网络流传着大部分韩国小姐都接受过整容手术的推测，网友还批评了这个亚洲国家人民爱“动刀子”的整容风潮。

The pageant sparked controversy last year when pictures emerged of winner Kim Yu-Mi before she had undergone plastic surgery, with many claiming that cosmetic procedures give contestants an unfair advantage.去年，2012年韩国小姐冠军金有美整容前照片的曝光引起了很大争议，很多人说整容手术对于这类选美比赛并不公平。

The student revealed her plastic surgery secret after photos emerged of her looking very different at school, but she said she hadn't misled anyone. 金有美在读书期间的照片曝光，与现在差别非常大，也让她做过整容手术的秘密暴露，不过金有美说她并没有误导任何人。

But she defended her crown telling the Korean media: 'I never said I was born beautiful.'不过她在接受韩国媒体采访时为自己辩护：“我从来没说过我天生丽质。”

South Koreans have more plastic surgery than any other nation according to figures released in January.根据一月份发布的数据显示，韩国的整容手术比世界上其他任何国家都要多。

The figures, from the International Society of Aesthetic Plastic Surgeons (ISAPS), show that in 2011, 15 million people across the globe turned to plastic surgery to enhance their looks.该数据来源于国际美容整容手术学会，数据显示在2011年，全球有1500万人为了改进长相去做整容手术。
